title: Generate Income ðŸ“ˆ
description: Generating income is the foundation of financial health. This involves your primary job, side hustles, and creating multiple streams of revenue to build a secure financial future.
sentences: Your primary job is your main income engine; focus on growth and skill development.
Side hustles can supplement your income and allow you to explore passions.
Passive income streams, once set up, can generate money with minimal active effort.
Regularly evaluate your earning potential and look for opportunities to increase it.
Networking and building professional connections can open doors to new income opportunities.
dos: Continuously learn and upgrade your skills.
Negotiate your salary effectively during job changes.
donts: Don't rely on a single source of income if possible.
Don't neglect your primary job for a side hustle without a solid plan.
Don't burn out by taking on too much.
